sentences.cn: 想占领更多地盘的鲁莽行为

sentences.en: Daring is not the same as foolhardiness , and Xiangzi though daring was never foolhardy.
sentences.cn: 假若胆壮不就是大意, 祥子在放胆跑的时候可并不大意.

sentences.en: Evil - doers always act in foolhardy manner.
He paid for the foolhardy act with his life.
sentences.cn: 他为鲁莽的举动付出了生命的代价.

sentences.en: He showed himself courageous even foolhardy under fire, and a great love of adventure and danger.
sentences.cn: 他表现出在战争中近乎有勇无谋的勇敢和喜欢冒险和危险的性格.

sentences.en: His foolhardy attempts to prove himself risked his life on occasion.
sentences.cn: 有时,他的鲁莽行为甚至会带来生命危险.

sentences.en: It was foolhardy ( of him ) to go swimming alone.
sentences.cn: ( 他 ) 独自一人去游泳真是鲁莽.

sentences.en: It was foolhardy to go swimming alone.
sentences.cn: 独自一人去游泳真是鲁莽.

sentences.en: It was foolhardy to have refused.
It would be foolhardy to sail in weather like this.
sentences.cn: 这种天气出航就是瞎冒险。

sentences.en: Let's be foolhardy and assume the best.
sentences.cn: 让我们大胆地往最好处设想.

sentences.en: Look before you leap. Don't be so foolhardy.
sentences.cn: 做事要瞻前顾后, 不要这样鲁莽.

sentences.en: Only the English can be so foolhardy.
sentences.cn: 只有英国人才会这么傻.

sentences.en: They were very foolhardy to jump off the bus while it was still moving.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车还未停定他们就跳下了车,真是太莽撞了.

sentences.en: When he tested an early vaccine on himself, some described the act as foolhardy.
sentences.cn: 当他在自己身上试验还处在初级阶段的疫苗时，有些人说他的行为是蛮干。

sentences.en: You were very foolhardy to jump off the bus while it was still moving.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车还未停定你便跳下车,真是太莽撞了.
